# Welcome

Welcome to Lancaster University's Department of Psychology modules on Statistics for Psychologists. In the sidebar, you will find a complete list of all the statistics modules that are currently offered. This is your one-stop shop for all the lab materials you need for working with R and statistics.

# Accessing the R Server

You can access the Department's R server at [psy-rstudio.lancaster.ac.uk](psy-rstudio.lancaster.ac.uk "Remember to connect with the VPN if you're off campus!"). Remember you will need to be on campus, or access via the VPN.
